name: Prismatic Power
description: The power deals additional $dmgType {must be different} damage.

name: Cleaving
description: Whenever the power's Accuracy component succeeds, you may replicate its effects to another creature of your choice adjacent to the target.

name: Sacrificial Channeling
description: The power no longer requires concentration, but while it is active, all damage you take is slightly increased.

name: Totems
description: Instead of its usual effect, the power summons a totem in an unoccupied space that you can see within 60' of you. The totem is a CR 1/2 minion with 0 speed that has only one action, which is to use the original power. The power now requires concentration.

name: Reaping
target: powers with melee range that deal damage
description: The power's reach is increased by 5' and it deals more damage against bloodied targets. Additionally, whenever the power scores a killing blow, roll a d4 to determine which of the following buffs to gain until you take a long rest: 1 - +1 Accuracy; 2 - increased max/current HP; 3 - +1 Defence; 4 - more damage.

name: Cruelty
target: powers that deal damage and do not apply DoTs
description: The power cannot apply DoTs, but it deals more damage against targets affected by a DoT.

name: Desperation
description: While you are bloodied, the power deals more damage.

name: Monochromatic Power
description: The power deals more damage, but can only deal {type} damage.

name: Potent Decay
description: The power's DoTs deal more damage.

name: Triggering Execution
description: Whenever the power scores a killing blow, you may immediately use another power that has a usage time of 1 action or faster as a free action.

name: Triggering Thorns
target: powers with a usage time of 1 action or faster
description: Whenever you substantially fail a saving throw or are substantially hit by an attack, you may immediately use the power as a free action.

name: Decay
description: Whenever the power hits, the target gains a DoT dealing slight $dmgType damage, stacking until CON save.

name: Prismatic Conversion
description: The power's base damage is converted to $dmgType {must be different} and it deals more damage.

name: Focused Decay
description: Whenever the power hits, the target gains a DoT dealing $dmgType damage, stacking until CON save. Additionally, the power deals less damage.

name: Sacrificial Empowerment
target: powers with a resource cost that apply buffs
description: The power's resource cost is replaced with a hit point cost equal to 6 times the original value. Additionally, your first hit of each turn (you can choose which hit in the case of multiple instantaneous hits) while you are buffed by the power applies a DoT dealing barely any $dmgType damage, stacking until CON save.

name: Balanced Decay
target: powers that hit and apply DoTs
description: The power deals slightly more hit damage and slightly more damage with its DoTs.

name: Untouched Power
description: The power deals substantially more damage while you are on full HP.

name: Focused Stability
target: powers with a resource cost that require concentration
description: Your concentration on the power cannot be broken against your will and its effectiveness is increased by 4 steps, but its resource cost is increased by 1 step and its duration is reduced by 1 step.

name: Power
description: The power deals more $dmgType damage.

name: Ascendance
description: The power is automatically upcast 1 level.

name: Protected Sapping
description: Whenever the power debuffs a creature, you gain damage barrier for the remainder of combat.

name: Stability
description: Your concentration on the power cannot be broken against your will.

name: Penetration
description: The power ignores $dmgType resistance.

name: Mass
target: powers with an area that deal damage
description: The power deals substantially more damage and has more area, but its usage time is increased by 1 step.

name: Volatile Summons
description: Whenever the power's minions take damage, they unleash an explosion of energy, making a spell attack against all foes adjacent to them that deals substantial $dmgType damage.

name: Protection
description: Whenever the power hits, you gain a substantial amount of damage barrier for 1 round.

name: Selflessness
target: powers that can apply buffs to you
description: The power cannot apply buffs to you, but it has +1 buff effectiveness.

name: Delegated Channeling
description: Your concentration on the power cannot be broken against your will and its effectiveness is increased by 1 step, but it can only remain active while you have an active minion. Each of your active minions have a DoT while the power is active that deals $dmgType damage.

name: Endurance
target: powers with a non-instantaneous duration that deal damage
description: The power's duration is increased by 1 step, but it deals less damage.

name: Keen Incubation
target: powers with a resource cost that make attacks
description: The power's resource cost is reduced by 1 step and whenever you use it during combat, it gains +1 crit range, stacking until the end of combat. Additionally, the power has -3 crit range.

name: Transfiguration
description: The power's governing ability becomes $ability {must be different}.

name: Propulsion
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is pushed 10' away from you.

name: Bursting
target: powers with a non-instantaneous duration that deal damage
description: The power's duration is reduced by 1 step, but it deals massively more damage.

name: Leeching
description: Whenever the power hits, you heal a slight amount of HP.

name: Sacrifice
description: The power's resource cost is replaced with a hit point cost equal to 5 times the original value.

name: Shattering
target: powers that hit and deal damage
description: Whenever the power hits, the target becomes sluggish and they take a slight amount of additional damage from all sources for 1 round. Additionally, the power deals less damage.

name: Intentionality
description: The power's usage time is increased by 1 step, but it deals massively more damage.

name: Explosive Power
description: The power splashes damage.

name: Potent Summons
description: The power's minions have +1 Accuracy and +1 Defence, but they deal less damage.

name: Alacrity
description: The power's usage time is reduced by 1 step, but it deals less damage.

name: Barraging
target: powers tht hit and deal damage
description: Whenever the power hits, it gains a slight amount of additional $dmgType damage, stacking until you go a full round without the power hitting.

name: Ebbing
target: powers that hit and deal damage
description: Every other time the power hits, it deals more damage and debilitates for 1 round.

name: Eruption
description: The power's first hit of each turn (you can choose which hit in the case of multiple instantaneous hits) erupts with energy. Make an attack against all foes adjacent to the target that deals $dmgType damage.

name: Crippling
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is $condition for 1 round.

name: Recoil
description: Whenever the power hits, it gains a slight amount of additional $dmgType damage for the remainder of combat and you immediately take {type} damage. Additionally, the power's hits debilitate the target for 1 round.

name: Sudden Empowerment
target: powers with a cooldown that apply buffs
description: The power's cooldown is increased by 1 step, but its usage time is reduced by 1 step. Additionally, it has +1 buff effectiveness.

name: Volatility
description: The power deals more damage, and its damage is now based on d20s.

name: Added Power
description: The power deals additional $dmgType damage.

name: Accuracy
description: The power has +1 Accuracy.

name: Efficiency
target: powers with a cooldown that deal damage
description: The power's cooldown is reduced by 1 step and its usage time is reduced by 1 step, but it deals massively less damage.

name: Explosions
target: single-target powers with a non-melee range
description: Instead of affecting its target, the power now affects all creatures of your choice in a 10'-radius sphere centred on the target.

name: Precision
target: powers with an Accuracy component that deal damage
description: The power has +2 Accuracy, but deals less damage.

name: Armour Penetration
description: The power has +1 AB and whenever it is blocked, the target gets -1 AC for 1 round.

name: Keen Triggering
description: Whenever the power crits, you may immediately use another power that has a usage time of 1 action or faster as a free action.

name: Vengeful Triggering
target: powers with a usage time of 1 action or faster
description: Whenever you are reduced to 0 HP, you may immediately use the power as a free action.

name: Chaining
target: powers that fire a single projectile and can hit
description: The first time the power's projectile hits whenever the power is used, you can immediately fire the projectile again from the target to a new target.

name: Empowerment
target: powers that hit and deal damage
description: Whenever the power hits, you gain increased damage and +1 crit range for the remainder of combat. Additionally, the power deals less damage.

name: Proximity
description: The power deals more damage against targets adjacent to you.

name: Keen Cruelty
description: Whenever the power crits, any DoTs it inflicts from that deal substantially more damage.

name: Execution
description: The power deals more damage against bloodied targets.

name: Forking
target: powers that fire a single projectile
description: The first time the power's projectile hits whenever the power is used, it splits into 2 and fires in a v-shape behind the target.

name: Fanning
target: powers that fire a single projectile
description: The power's projectile is converted into a cone with range equal to the original projectile's. Additionally, the power deals less damage.

name: Volleying
target: powers that fire a single projectile
description: The power's projectile is converted into a 25'-wide line with range equal to the original projectile's. Additionally, the power deals less damage.

name: Exploitation
target: powers that hit and deal damage
description: Whenever the power hits a debuffed target, the target is staggered for 1 round.

name: Prepared Execution
description: Whenever the power hits, the target becomes staggered for 1 round. Additionally, whenever the power scores a killing blow against a debuffed target, you gain barely any increased global damage for the remainder of combat.

name: Marking
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is marked to take slightly increased damage from all sources for 1 round.

name: Recouperation
target: powers with a resource cost that hit and deal damage
description: Whenever the power hits, it refunds 1 unit of its resource cost. Additionally, it deals less damage.

name: Mastered Triggering
target: powers with a usage time of 1 action or faster
description: Whenever you cast a spell of your highest available level or use a maneuver of your highest available degree, you may immediately use the power as a free action.

name: Cruel Triggering
target: powers with a usage time of 1 action or faster that apply debuffs
description: Whenever you hit with another power, you may immediately use the power as a free action. Additionally, the power has -1 debuff effectiveness.

name: Echoing
target: powers with a usage time of 1 action or faster
description: Whenever you use the power, you may use it again as a free action at the start of your next turn.

name: Stillness
description: The power deals more damage if you haven't moved since the start of your last turn.

name: Keenness
target: powers that make attacks and deal damage
description: Whenever the power crits, it gains +1 crit range and substantially increased crit damage for 1 round.

name: Piercing
target: powers that fire a single projectile
description: The power's projectile is converted into a 5'-wide line with the same range as the original projectile. Additionally, the power deals less damage.

name: Powerful Proximity
description: The power deals substantially more damage against targets adjacent to you, but less damage against targets 10+' away from you.

name: Returning
target: powers with line areas and usage times of 1 action or faster
description: After using the power, you may use it again as a free action at the start of your next turn, but it starts from the original usage's end point and points towards your location at the time of the repeat.

name: Intense Decay
target: powers that apply DoTs with ongoing DCs to end them
description: The power's DoTs with ongoing DCs to end them deal substantially more damage, but have -1 to their ongoing DCs.

name: Charges
description: The power can be used 1 additional time during its cooldown window, but its cooldown is increased by 1 step.

name: Clumsy Power
target: powers with an Accuracy component that deal damage
description: The power deals substantially more damage, but has -1 Accuracy.

name: Cruel Power
description: The power deals more damage against targets with a DoT.
